info.title: Offline Network Enabler
info.author: Suloku
info.details:
This applications allows to enable and use a network connection (set up from the wii's system menu configuration screen) even if there's no internet access, since the wii won't allow using a connection if it doesn't pass the internet test.

Warning! This application writes to the nand.

Nand access based on fstoolbox by Nicksasa and WiiPower
